models.title: Models
models.onboardingDescription: Select an AI model provider to get started with AGIME. You'll need to use API keys generated by each provider which will be encrypted and stored locally. You can change your provider at any time in settings.
models.selectProviderAndModel: Select a provider and model to use for your conversations.
models.pleaseSelectOrEnterModel: Please select or enter a model
models.selectModelTypeToSearch: Select a model, type to search

leadWorker.title: Lead/Worker Mode
leadWorker.description: Configure a lead model for planning and a worker model for execution
leadWorker.leadModelDescription: Strong model for initial planning and fallback recovery
leadWorker.workerModelDescription: Fast model for routine execution tasks
leadWorker.initialLeadTurnsDescription: Number of turns to use the lead model at the start
leadWorker.failureThresholdDescription: Consecutive failures before switching back to lead
leadWorker.fallbackTurnsDescription: Turns to use lead model during fallback

resetProvider.title: Reset Provider and Model
resetProvider.description: Clear your selected model and provider settings to start fresh
resetProvider.warning: This will clear your selected model and provider settings. If no defaults are available, you'll be taken to the welcome screen to set them up again.

provider.noConfigParameters: No configuration parameters for this provider.
provider.cannotDeleteActive: You cannot delete {{provider}} while it's currently in use. Please switch to a different model before deleting this provider.
provider.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the configuration parameters for {{provider}}? This action cannot be undone.
provider.cannotDeleteActiveDescription: You cannot delete this provider while it's currently in use. Please switch to a different model first.
provider.permanentDeleteDescription: This will permanently delete the current provider configuration.
provider.addApiKeyDescription: Add your API key(s) for this provider to integrate into AGIME
provider.configCheckError: There was an error checking this provider configuration.
provider.configCheckAgain: Check your configuration again to use this provider.

apiKeyTester.description: Enter your API key and we'll automatically detect which provider it works with.
apiKeyTester.placeholder: Enter your API key (OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, etc.)
apiKeyTester.couldNotDetect: Could not detect provider from API key
apiKeyTester.suggestionValidKey: Make sure you are using a valid API key from OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, Groq, or xAI
apiKeyTester.suggestionComplete: Check that the key is complete and not truncated
apiKeyTester.suggestionActive: Verify your API key is active and has sufficient credits
apiKeyTester.suggestionOllama: For local Ollama setup, use the "Other Providers" section below

chat.title: Chat
chat.modeDescription: Configure how AGIME interacts with tools and extensions
chat.responseStylesDescription: Choose how AGIME should format and style its responses
chat.toolSelectionDescription: Experimental: configure how AGIME selects tools for your requests, useful when there are many tools. Only tested with Claude models currently.
chat.maxTurnsDescription: Maximum agent turns before AGIME asks for user input

promptInjection.title: Enable Prompt Injection Detection
promptInjection.description: Detect and prevent potential prompt injection attacks
promptInjection.thresholdDescription: Higher values are more strict (0.01 = very lenient, 1.0 = maximum strict)

voiceDictationToggle.title: Enable Voice Dictation
voiceDictationToggle.description: Show microphone button for voice input

responseStyles.detailedDescription: Tool calls are by default shown open to expose details
responseStyles.conciseDescription: Tool calls are by default closed and only show the tool used

dictation.providerDescription: Choose how voice is converted to text
dictation.enterNewApiKey: Enter new API key to update
dictation.openaiInfo: Uses OpenAI's Whisper API for high-quality transcription. Requires an OpenAI API key configured in the Models section.
dictation.elevenLabsInfo: Uses ElevenLabs speech-to-text API for high-quality transcription.
dictation.elevenLabsNote: Requires an ElevenLabs API key with speech-to-text access.

session.title: Session
session.externalBackendDescription: Connect to an external AGIME backend

gooseServer.title: AGIME Server
gooseServer.description: By default AGIME launches a server for you, use this to connect to an external AGIME server
gooseServer.useExternalDescription: Connect to a AGIME server running elsewhere (requires app restart)
gooseServer.secretKeyDescription: The secret key configured on the goosed server (GOOSE_SERVER__SECRET_KEY)
gooseServer.restartNote: Note: Changes require restarting AGIME to take effect. New chat windows will connect to the external server.
gooseServer.urlProtocolError: URL must use http or https protocol

app.title: App
app.updatesDescription: Check for and install updates to keep AGIME running at its best
app.appearanceDescription: Configure how AGIME appears on your system
app.notificationsManaged: Notifications are managed by your OS
app.menuBarIconDescription: Show AGIME in the menu bar
app.preventSleepDescription: Keep your computer awake while AGIME is running a task (screen can still lock)
app.costTrackingDescription: Show model pricing and usage costs
app.unableToFetchPricing: Unable to fetch pricing data. Costs will not be displayed.
app.themeDescription: Customize the look and feel of AGIME
app.helpFeedbackDescription: Help us improve AGIME by reporting issues or requesting new features

notificationsMacOS.step3: Find and select AGIME in the application list
notificationsMacOS.step4: Enable notifications and adjust settings as desired

notificationsWindows.step3: Find and select AGIME in the application list
notificationsWindows.step4: Toggle notifications on and adjust settings as desired

diagnostics.title: Download Diagnostics
diagnostics.description: Hit the download button to get a zip file containing all the important information to diagnose a problem in AGIME. You can share this file with the team or if you are a developer look at it yourself.
diagnostics.warning: Warning: If your session contains sensitive information, do not share this file publicly.

telemetry.title: Privacy
telemetry.description: Control how your data is used
telemetry.anonymousUsageDescription: Help improve AGIME by sharing anonymous usage statistics.

goosehints.title: Configure Project Hints (.goosehints)
goosehints.description: Provide additional context about your project to improve communication with AGIME
goosehints.sectionDescription: Configure your project's .goosehints file to provide additional context to AGIME
goosehints.helpText1: .goosehints is a text file used to provide additional context about your project and improve the communication with AGIME.
goosehints.helpText2: Please make sure Developer extension is enabled in the extensions page. This extension is required to use .goosehints. You'll need to restart your session for .goosehints updates to take effect.

prompts.sectionDescription: Customize the AI agent's core behavior and personality
prompts.editDescription: Modify the system prompt that defines how AGIME behaves
prompts.placeholder: Enter your custom system prompt here...
prompts.warning: Modifying the system prompt may significantly change AGIME's behavior. Use with caution.
prompts.templateDescription: Select a template to use as a starting point for your custom prompt

status.ready: Update downloaded and ready to install!
status.latestVersion: You are running the latest version!

info.autoDownload: Update will be downloaded automatically in the background.
info.manualInstall: After download, you'll need to manually install the update.
info.autoInstall: The update will be installed automatically when you quit the app.

ready.githubReady: ✓ Update is ready! Click "Install & Restart" for installation instructions.
ready.githubManual: Manual installation required for this update method.
ready.autoReady: ✓ Update is ready! It will be installed when you quit AGIME.
ready.installNow: Or click "Install & Restart" to update now.

tunnel.title: Remote Access
tunnel.description: Enable remote access to AGIME from mobile devices using secure tunneling.

connectionModal.title: Remote Access Connection
connectionModal.scanHint: Scan this QR code with the AGIME mobile app. Do not share this code with anyone else as it is for your personal access.

appStoreModal.title: Download AGIME iOS App
appStoreModal.scanHint: Scan this QR code with your iPhone camera to install the AGIME mobile app from the App Store

config.title: Configuration
config.descriptionWithProvider: Edit your AGIME configuration settings (current settings for {{provider}})

toolSelection.disabledDescription: Use the default tool selection strategy
toolSelection.enabledDescription: Use LLM-based intelligence to select the most relevant tools based on the user query context.

errors.updateStrategy: Failed to update tool selection strategy
errors.fetchSetting: Failed to fetch current router setting

sessionSharing.title: Session Sharing
sessionSharing.descriptionConfigured: Session sharing is configured but fully opt-in — your sessions are only shared when you explicitly click the share button.
sessionSharing.descriptionNotConfigured: You can enable session sharing to share your sessions with others.
sessionSharing.alreadyConfigured: Session sharing has already been configured
sessionSharing.invalidUrl: Invalid URL format. Please enter a valid URL (e.g. https://example.com/api).
sessionSharing.serverError: Server error: HTTP {{status}}. The server may not be configured correctly.
sessionSharing.unableToReach: Unable to reach the server. Please check the URL and your network connection.
sessionSharing.connectionTimeout: Connection timed out. The server may be slow or unreachable.

permission.title: Permission Rules
permission.description: Hidden instructions that will be passed to the provider to help direct and add context to your responses.
permission.modalDescription: Configure tool permissions for extensions to control how they interact with your system.
permission.noToolsAvailable: No tools available for this extension

customProvider.title: Add Provider
customProvider.apiKeyExistingPlaceholder: Leave blank to keep existing key
customProvider.localModel: This is a local model (no auth required)

validation.modelsRequired: At least one model is required
